name: The House of the Dead III
name_original: The House of the Dead III
description:
The House of the Dead III is an arcade game developed by Wow Entertainment. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by SEGA. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
The House of the Dead III is available on PC, Wii and PlayStation 3.
It was directed by Takashi Oda. Eriko Sakurai scored the game.
